name: com.smashshipstudios.xenonrunner
description:
Build your own custom Xenon-Runner levels to upload to the steam workshop for others to run
 You must also install
 https://github.com/heathen-engineering/SystemCore.git?path=/com.heathen.systemcore 
 https://github.com/rlabrecque/Steamworks.NET.git?path=/com.rlabrecque.steamworks.net 
 https://github.com/Unity-Technologies/AssetBundles-Browser.git

samples.description: Contains the assets to build Xenon-Runner Levels, I higly recommend you start by modding this and uploading it as your own.
